text:
Hi all, I have a small but annoying issue.

I am trying to create a blog page with new modules, but I can’t seem to find the new modules on the blog page. I enabled the modules as Blog Page, but I still can’t see them on any of the blog pages I created whilst I’m on editor mode. I can see them however on Website Pages.

How can I enable modules to appear on Blog Pages?

Thank you very much!

Hi everyone! Working my through HubSpot academy. I'm working on the lesson for setting up the local development tooling, including setting up the test theme. As per the video instructions I ran npx @HubSpot/create-cms-project test-theme in the terminal. As expected, this created a test-theme folder, however the folder is empty. Based on the lesson video, it should contain a whole bunch of files lol. Has anyone run into this problem or know how to fix it? Thanks!
